#summary Supported platforms

Embox supports several types of processor architecture this page contains examples of real hardware platforms (boards) which Embox is supported.

== SPARC =
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/ml505.png" width="320" height="240"> || Embox supports [http://www.gaisler.com/cms/ Leon3] processor. Is is open source processor which compatible with SPARC v8 architecture. We run Embox on the [http://www.xilinx.com/products/devkits/HW-V5-ML505-UNI-G.htm Virtex-5 LXT FPGA ML505 Evaluation Platform]. More details you can get [ML505Description here] ||

== !MicroBlaze ==
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G.png" width="320" height="240"> || Embox supports [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MicroBlaze Microblaze] processor. This processor is supported by [http://www.xilinx.com/tools/microblaze.htm Xilinx]. We run Embox on the [http://www.terraelectronica.ru/catalog_info.php?ID=1038&CODE=282158&Name=HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G&Razdel=%CE%F2%EB%E0%E4%EE%F7%ED%FB%E5%20%E8%20%EE%F6%E5%ED%EE%F7%ED%FB%E5%20%EF%EB%E0%F2%FB%20%E8%20%ED%E0%E1%EE%F0%FB%20%E4%EB%FF%20%F1%E5%EC%E5%E9%F1%F2%E2%E0%20Spartan-3A%28N%29&TableName=class_19_4_6_6_3 HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G Starter Kit]. More details [SpartanDescription here]  ||

== ARM ==
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/SAM7-P256-1.png" width="320" height="240"> || This development board contains at91sam7 controller and simple peripheral. It is very cheap and easy to development start. More details [PlatformOlimexSam7 here] ||
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/embox_lego.jpg" width="320" height="240">  || Embox supports [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lego_Mindstorms Lego Mindstorms NXT]. More Details [PlatformLegoNxt here] ||
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/board_stm32vl_discovery.jpg" width="320" height="240">  || This development board contains Cortex-M3 and integrated debugger. More details [PlatformStm32Discovery here] ||

== x86 ==
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/embox_asus.jpg" width="320" height="240"> || Embox supports PC platform the same, and it can be executed on [http://wiki.qemu.org/Main_Page QEMU].||
 || <img src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/PlatformsDescription/bifferboard.png" width="320" height="240"> || Embox supports [http://sites.google.com/site/bifferboard Bifferboard]. More Details [PlatformBifferboard here] ||
